bio: N'more gets bored of things quickly. Some say his cool brows and beard grew from his boredom with shaving.

soultimate.name: Yawnehameha
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drop foe's movement speed by 50% and Move Meter speed by 30% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Attack to decrease foes' speed for a time.

skill.effect: Effects of used items are shared with nearby allies.
skill.name: Sharing is Caring

name: N'more
